data.marketing-index-description: Организуйте коворкинг центр и события с ПО andCards. Каталог участников, мгновенный поиск, СМС и push уведомления, мероприятия, система бронировки комнат, интеграции, и многое другое.
data.marketing-index-highlight-it-starts-with: Automate your coworking space to save time and earn more
data.marketing-index-highlight-main-subtitle: andCards software will make people love your coworking space: stay longer and easily book facilities.
data.marketing-index-feature-coworking-direct: Build a business network for your coworking space residents.
data.marketing-index-feature-effective-space-: Focus on more important tasks: while andCards automates your coworking space.
data.marketing-index-feature-event-management: Create events to foster networking at your coworking space.
